DOC.brief_title: Social Interactions Between People With Dementia Nursing Home
DOC.detailed_description: 60 people moderate dementia live french nursing homme participate study . Residents give oral consent twice participate . They classify group six resident take account socio-demographic medical characteristic . Two experimental condition propose : 1. social stimulation session ( 36 resident ) 2. control group without direct social stimulation ( 24 resident ) . Collected socio-demographic medical characteristic age , gender , timf institutionalization , sociocultural level , marital status diagnostic hypothesis . Before study , scale questionnaire use assess cognitive status Mini Mental State Examination ( Folstein et al , 1975 ) ; functional ability Instrumental Activities Daily Living ( Lawton Brody , 1969 ) ; depression Cornell Scale Depression Dementia ( Alexopoulos et al , 1988 ) ; psychological behavioural disorder Neuropsychiatric Inventory ( Cummings et al , 1994 ) ; quality life Alzheimer 's Disease Related Quality Life ( Rabins et al , 1999 ) . Social interaction video tap analyzed grid observation . The aim study see impact social interaction one social stimulation session compare control group situation .
